year_range.comment: Supports both year (1990) and year-month (1990-11) formats. For year-month, all combinations between start and end will be generated (e.g., 1990-11 to 2000-12)

delays.comment: FAST MODE: Reduced delays for faster processing

comment_pause: Pause every 150 searches for 8 seconds to avoid detection

browser.comment: Headless mode for VPS (no GUI needed)

comment_batch: Write results in batches of 100 matches
